bookmarks.title: Understanding Dharma
bookmarks.query: What is the meaning of dharma?
bookmarks.response: Dharma represents righteous duty and moral law in Hindu philosophy. It is the principle of natural order that regulates and coordinates the operation of the universe and everything within it....
